UniprotID	Q9BXA7
Accession	Q9BXA7;B2R8D9
EntryName	TSSK1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Testis-specific serine/threonine-protein kinase 1 (TSK-1) (TSK1) (TSSK-1) (Testis-specific kinase 1) (EC 2.7.11.1) (Serine/threonine-protein kinase 22A)
GeneName	TSSK1B SPOGA1 SPOGA4 STK22A STK22D TSSK1 FKSG81
Length	367
Function	Testis-specific serine/threonine-protein kinase required during spermatid development. Phosphorylates 'Ser-288' of TSKS. Involved in the late stages of spermatogenesis, during the reconstruction of the cytoplasm. During spermatogenesis, required for the transformation of a ring-shaped structure around the base of the flagellum originating from the chromatoid body.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytoplasmic vesicle; Secretory vesicle; Acrosome; Cell projection; Cilium; Flagellum
Disorder	0.1791,0.0967,0.0531,0.0313,0.0424,0.0263,0.0405,0.0269,0.0349,0.0494,0.0618,0.0817,0.0433,0.0334,0.0433,0.0341,0.0543,0.0967,0.0799,0.0433,0.0424,0.0483,0.0870,0.0851,0.1449,0.0719,0.1399,0.0835,0.1184,0.0676,0.0618,0.0341,0.0191,0.0334,0.0424,0.0424,0.0676,0.0543,0.0676,0.0662,0.1184,0.0568,0.0287,0.0306,0.0555,0.0258,0.0306,0.0334,0.0543,0.0734,0.0734,0.0799,0.0799,0.0835,0.0662,0.0518,0.0294,0.0320,0.0405,0.0205,0.0253,0.0148,0.0171,0.0287,0.0269,0.0163,0.0349,0.0356,0.0151,0.0160,0.0151,0.0248,0.0235,0.0414,0.0734,0.0592,0.0414,0.0414,0.0248,0.0198,0.0349,0.0209,0.0294,0.0341,0.0372,0.0356,0.0676,0.0349,0.0364,0.0851,0.0443,0.0244,0.0248,0.0248,0.0258,0.0253,0.0313,0.0306,0.0543,0.0909,0.1184,0.1206,0.1554,0.1881,0.2503,0.2364,0.1323,0.1275,0.2094,0.2064,0.1914,0.1881,0.2436,0.1583,0.1554,0.0888,0.0518,0.0662,0.1206,0.0690,0.0662,0.0398,0.0235,0.0294,0.0294,0.0313,0.0188,0.0389,0.0227,0.0218,0.0405,0.0240,0.0248,0.0188,0.0334,0.0341,0.0646,0.0543,0.0581,0.0313,0.0555,0.0300,0.0463,0.0765,0.0356,0.0349,0.0168,0.0275,0.0275,0.0506,0.0258,0.0151,0.0248,0.0443,0.0799,0.0765,0.0749,0.0719,0.1184,0.0909,0.0929,0.0929,0.1554,0.1583,0.0780,0.0909,0.0909,0.1731,0.2002,0.1731,0.1048,0.1528,0.2034,0.2224,0.2328,0.1671,0.1070,0.1184,0.1162,0.0888,0.1275,0.1251,0.1373,0.1583,0.1583,0.2094,0.2193,0.2258,0.1554,0.0719,0.0851,0.0929,0.1115,0.0967,0.0506,0.0294,0.0258,0.0269,0.0214,0.0160,0.0148,0.0130,0.0202,0.0160,0.0160,0.0104,0.0143,0.0240,0.0231,0.0405,0.0494,0.0494,0.0799,0.0676,0.0618,0.0985,0.1007,0.1759,0.2470,0.2918,0.3460,0.4507,0.3948,0.4087,0.3460,0.3460,0.4409,0.4292,0.4186,0.4256,0.3460,0.4292,0.4330,0.4507,0.3910,0.4619,0.4766,0.4831,0.4017,0.3182,0.3087,0.2849,0.2193,0.2884,0.3019,0.4119,0.3356,0.3426,0.3460,0.3529,0.2918,0.3631,0.2988,0.3149,0.3182,0.3426,0.2884,0.2783,0.3494,0.3321,0.3249,0.3019,0.3426,0.4292,0.4119,0.3704,0.3599,0.4186,0.4119,0.4330,0.4369,0.4476,0.4256,0.4292,0.4220,0.4017,0.4831,0.5533,0.5707,0.5665,0.6851,0.7982,0.8313,0.8198,0.8
